HOME.TITLE: Get instant financial support covering up to 30% of your needs
HOME.SUBTITLE: Fast and simple financial aid with no interest or repayment

HEADER.TITLE: Get instant financial support covering up to 30% of your needs
HEADER.SUBTITLE: We provide quick, non-refundable financial aid through an easy online process. No paperwork, no guarantors, no repayment obligations.

COUNTER1.DESCRIPTION: Team members ready to help anytime

GET_SUPPORT.TITLE: Easy access to real financial support without complications
GET_SUPPORT.SUBtitle: We’ve helped thousands get support without paperwork or guarantees... and we’re ready to help you today.
GET_SUPPORT.DESCRIPTION: We don’t provide loans and we don’t ask for any financial commitment later. What we offer is non-refundable financial support to help meet your needs—no interest, no installments.

NO_GUARANTOR.TITLE: No Guarantor Needed
NO_GUARANTOR.DESCRIPTION: Get support without needing a guarantor

NO_OBLIGATION.TITLE: No Repayment Obligation
NO_OBLIGATION.DESCRIPTION: No hidden fees or repayment requirements

STEP1.TITLE: Fill Out the Form
STEP1.DESCRIPTION: Register for free and complete your application online. No technical skills required.

STEP2.TITLE: Pay the Service Fee
STEP2.DESCRIPTION: We automatically calculate the fee based on the amount. Pay easily through available methods.

STEP3.TITLE: We Contact You & Support You
STEP3.DESCRIPTION: After payment, our team will contact you via WhatsApp or phone to complete the process.

SERVICE_DESCRIPTION.TITLE: Service Description
SERVICE_DESCRIPTION.CONTENT: We are an online platform that acts as an intermediary to facilitate the submission of financial assistance applications for individuals. We use a simple electronic system that allows users to submit their information and pay a service fee to process the application and deliver it to donors.

USER_RESPONSIBILITIES.TITLE: User Responsibilities
ITEMS: The user is obligated to provide correct and complete information when completing the application.
The user acknowledges that the amount paid is a processing fee only and does not guarantee support.
The user agrees to be contacted after payment via the number provided in the application.

PRIVACY_DATA_PROTECTION.TITLE: Privacy and Data Protection
ITEMS: All data entered by the user is used solely for the purpose of processing the request and communication.
We are committed to not sharing user data with any third party without their consent, except for supporting entities directly related to their request.

AMENDMENTS_TERMS.TITLE: Amendments to the Terms
AMENDMENTS_TERMS.CONTENT: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time, and the updated version will be posted on this page with the date of the update.

HOW_TO_APPLY.TITLE: A simple way to access real financial support
HOW_TO_APPLY.SUBTITLE: no hassle, no stress.
HOW_TO_APPLY.DESCRIPTION: We have helped thousands of people obtain support without paperwork or guarantees... and we are ready to assist you today.

FAST_SUPPORT.TITLE: Immediate support fast
FAST_SUPPORT.DESCRIPTION: As soon as you submit your request and pay the fees, we will immediately start processing your request and get in touch with you.

SIMPLE_PROCESS.TITLE: Simple process
SIMPLE_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: Complete your application in minutes with our streamlined online form. No technical skills required.

NO_PAPERWORK.TITLE: No paperwork needed
NO_PAPERWORK.DESCRIPTION: Skip the hassle of gathering documents. We only need basic information to process your request.

ACCESSIBLE.TITLE: Accessible to everyone
ACCESSIBLE.DESCRIPTION: Our service is designed to be inclusive and available to all who need financial support.

Q1.QUESTION: Are there any guarantees required to obtain support?
Q1.ANSWER: No, we do not require any guarantees. All we need from you is to fill out the form with basic information such as your name, mobile number, IBAN, and the bank you are affiliated with. We will not ask for any official documents, guarantors, or complex paperwork. The aim of the service is to facilitate access to financial support in the simplest way possible.

Q2.QUESTION: What is your cancellation policy?
Q2.ANSWER: You can cancel your order within 24 hours of submission for a full refund. After that, you will need to discuss your request with us directly.

Q3.QUESTION: Do you offer customer support?
Q3.ANSWER: Yes, we provide customer support around the clock via live chat and email.

Q4.QUESTION: How are subscription fees calculated?
Q4.ANSWER: Subscription fees are calculated based on the services you choose. We offer various packages to suit different needs, and you can find detailed pricing information on our website.

Q5.QUESTION: Is there a maximum amount I can request support for?
Q5.ANSWER: Yes, the maximum amount you can request support for depends on your specific circumstances and the type of financial support you are seeking. We will assess your application to determine the appropriate amount.

Q6.QUESTION: Is the service only available to Saudi citizens?
Q6.ANSWER: No, our service is available to all individuals who meet the eligibility criteria
